title: Lowest Control of Corruption Standard Error
description: In 2023, Romania had the lowest standard error in the Control of Corruption indicator, with a value of 0.1449, indicating high precision in corruption control estimates.

title: Lowest Arms Exports
description: In 2023, Romania had one of the lowest arms exports, valued at 1,000,000 SIPRI trend indicator values, indicating minimal involvement in the global arms trade.

title: Highest Alcohol Consumption Per Capita
description: In 2020, Romania had the highest total alcohol consumption per capita, with 16.8 liters of pure alcohol consumed per person aged 15 and over.

title: Highest Alcohol Consumption Per Capita, Male
description: In 2020, Romanian males had the highest alcohol consumption per capita, with 27.03 liters of pure alcohol consumed per male aged 15 and over.

title: Highest Growth Rate in Income for Bottom 40%
description: In 2022, Romania experienced the highest annualized average growth rate in per capita real survey mean consumption or income for the bottom 40% of the population, at 11.42%.
